Record.ClassificationPath: Respiratory Tract Diseases/Lung Diseases/Lung Diseases, Fungal/Pulmonary Aspergillosis
Record.Description: Infections of the respiratory tract with fungi of the genus ASPERGILLUS. Infections may result in allergic reaction (ALLERGIC BRONCHOPULMONARY ASPERGILLOSIS), colonization in pulmonary cavities as fungus balls (MYCETOMA), or lead to invasion of the lung parenchyma (INVASIVE PULMONARY ASPERGILLOSIS).
